TopicTitle: Soldier 1998: question about the star system...

Articles.Content: So there was a recent thread that mentioned this movie. I decided to check it out, and it's pretty good. But I can't help but wonder what star system this might represent, if any. It appears to have four stars- three I presume are yellow dwarfs, the fourth is blue-white in color and appears very small compared to the others, though this may just be the distance the star orbits at. Any ideas what star system this might represent?
